page.title: 14GREEN ACRES FARM KEMBERTON
page.content: This farm is owned by Mr Lea. The farm house and buildings are about 15 years old. His previous farm house was on land purchased by Telford Development Corporation. He has 6 fields by the farm, 2 in the village and 3 in another part of the parish. He owns 210 acres, of which 145 are used for grain. There are 5 acres of woodland the rest being grassland for about 70 beef cattle. Cattle are usually bought from Shrewsbury market. The boundary hedges to the farm have been retained but the internal hedges were removed about 20 years ago to facilitate mechanised farming. Electric fences are now used. Machinery used to be contracted but now Mr Lea is self-sufficient. He employs a full time worker and a part-time worker.
